article_title: Tenet Healthcare Nearing Deal to Buy United Surgical Partners
article_text:
Tenet Healthcare Corp. is nearing a deal to buy United Surgical Partners International Inc., as a number of hospital networks seek mergers amid sweeping changes in the U.S. health-care system.

A deal between the companies, which could be valued at more than $2.5 billion, including debt, might be announced as early as Monday, according to people familiar with the matter. It is also possible the deal could fall apart at the last...
